title: Joseph Chamberlain
text: He never succeeded in his grand ambitions. However, he was a highly proficient grassroots organizer of democratic instincts, and played the central role in winning the Second Boer War.

title: Mr. Moto Takes a Vacation
text: The movie was the seventh filmed in the series. However it was not released until after" Mr. Moto in Danger Island", which was the last filmed out of eight Mr. Moto films from 20th Century Fox.

title: The Old Soak
text: " The Old Soak" is now presumed lost. However, a 16 mm reduction positive print may exist in a private collection.
